alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 9:18AM CST until February 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM CST Monday was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
